title: LOVECRAFT COUNTRY Episode 4 Breakdown, Theories, and Details You Missed!
author: Think Story
comment: What did you think of this week's ep? 🔪🩸
Dude..Leti’s sister name is Ruby. Tulsa wasn’t a Race riot, it was a massacre. George, Montrose and Tic’s mom are Tulsa survivors.
Didn't realise I needed a black Indiana Jones until now. I loved this episode. Got so frustrated with hypolyta and montrose 😩 love it
Correction "TULSA MASSACRE", it wasn't a riot

Monstrose let go of the map when they were in the water...he’s sabotaging all the way EDIT: As pointed out in the comments he did have it ticked in the his back pants and it flew out   But also clearly he’s trying to stop them
description:
In this video we take a deep dive and breakdown episode 4 "A History of Violence" of HBO's latest series Lovecraft Country based off the book by Matt Ruff. Review, recap, and easter eggs! 

Follow me on twitter: www.twitter.com/thinkstoryYT
